definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Magnesium aluminum hydroxides show higher adsorption capacity to the model pitch and stickies at neutral pH.
sentences.chinese: 氫氧化鎂鋁對樹脂和膠黏物在中性條件下吸附量較大。

sentences.english: Preparation of magnesia whiskers by high-temperature flux method;
sentences.chinese: 採用循環晶種的方法制取了氫氧化鎂。

sentences.english: Objective This paper focused on adjusting the release rates of risperidone from PLGA microspheres by co-encapsulating Mg(OH)2.
sentences.chinese: 目的用氫氧化鎂調節利培酮PLGA微球的釋放速度。

sentences.english: The influence of operating conditions on the performance of Mg(OH) 2 is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了試驗條件對氫氧化鎂性能的影響。

sentences.english: Super-fine magnesium hydroxide powder winch surface is treated is a kind of environment-friendly fire-retardant of polymer.
sentences.chinese: 超細活性氫氧化鎂是一種重要的環保型阻燃材料。

sentences.english: The advances in production Process and Method of Ultrafine Magnesium Hydroxide is researched.
sentences.chinese: 就超細氫氧化鎂阻燃劑的製作與阻燃性能做出研究。

sentences.english: Super-fine magnesium hydroxide powder which surface is treated is a kind of environment-friendly fire-retardant of polymer.
sentences.chinese: 超細活性氫氧化鎂是一種重要的環保型阻燃材料。

sentences.english: With the process according to the invention a lactate salt is formed and magnesium hydroxide.
sentences.chinese: 用本發明的方法形成乳酸鹽和氫氧化鎂。

sentences.english: How to accelerate the sedimentation rate of magnesium hydroxide was studied in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文針對如何加快氫氧化鎂的沉降速度進行了研究。
